Medium: 33 line block reproductions after lithographs, woodcuts, and drawings by various artists: 1 after Henri Anquetin; 3 after Pierre Bonnard; 7 after Henri Ibels; 6 after Hermann Paul; 12 after Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec; 3 after Félix Vallotton; and 1 after Adolphe Willette
Title: L'ESCARMOUCHE: Première année No.-No.8 and Deuxième année No.1-No.2
